WorkflowInfo.Name: Archive old IIS log files
WorkflowInfo.Description: Find and archive old IIS log files
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:FolderCreate;Assembly=FolderCreate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:FolderList;Assembly=FolderList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ZipCompress;Assembly=ZipCompress, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:DeleteFolder;Assembly=DeleteFolder, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:Executor;Assembly=Executor, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="IIS Log Files Report
-------------------------------" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Report" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /><ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\IIS_Servers.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"><ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns6:FolderCreate IsValid="True" x:Name="folderCreate1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Create Folder" Path="c:\temp_zip" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Create a folder" HostId="-2" TypeName="FolderCreate" UserName="" /><ns7:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="%ServerName%" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TimeSelection="90.00:00:00" Path="C:\inetpub\logs\LogFiles\W3SVC1" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="1" Condition="0" Timeout="00:05:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="True" MapDrive="True" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%folderList1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="folderList1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FilePath" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%folderList1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="folderList1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns11:Executor Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Executor" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TypeName="Executor" Arguments=""%FilePath%" c:\temp_zip" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="executor1" Timeout="00:01:00" Command="MoveFiles" UserName="" Description="Run an execution file" Continue="False" CommandNumber="64" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns8:ZipCompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="%ServerName%" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Zip Compression" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" x:Name="zipCompress1" TypeName="ZipCompress" DstPath="c:\temp_zip.zip" SrcHostName="%ServerName%" EncryptionType="Standard" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="c:\temp_zip" ArchivePassword="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a Zip Compressed file with the specified compression type." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="0" ZipCompressionLevel="" SrcUserName="" /><ns9:DeleteFolder IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFolder1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete Folder" Path="c:\temp_zip" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected folder." HostId="-2" TypeName="DeleteFolder" UserName="" /><ns10:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Seconds" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm" TypeName="GetDate" TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZone="120" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." DisplayName="Get Date" TimeZoneIsInDaylightSavingTime="False" TimeToAdd="0" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="%getDate1% IIS log files older than 90 days on %ServerBane% has been zipped" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="Report" x:Name="memorySet2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="IIS log files zip report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%Report%</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
